Player Command
==============

See: :doc:`color <color>` :doc:`colours <colours>` :doc:`simplify <simplify>` 

USAGE

  |  ``mode``
  |  ``mode plain``
  |  ``mode vt100``
  |  ``mode xterm``
  |  ``mode ansi``

Typing ``mode`` will show if your character is set to receive ansi codes
from the MUD (used to display colours).
